title: Youth and credit (Captioned)
brief_description: Geoff Scott presents a dramatised story of a young man who encounters a series of escalating problems with credit, relating to the purchase of a car. The film is then discussed with an invited audience of teenagers and ‘experts’ with the aim of introducing safe ways of handling credit. The video is accompanied by Teacher’s notes. Pt. 1. The forum. Pt. 2. Eddy: a trigger film.
